changes: Session 03 begins: Insaerndel accepts Maven Black-Briar's Honningbrew job (Dampened Spirits).
Traveled from Riften to Whiterun Hold and approached Honningbrew Meadery.
Used Spell of Veils (Lore Create Advantage) to assume 'Whiterun Guard' disguise; succeeded with style, gaining 2 free invokes on 'Veiled Identity: Whiterun Guard'.
Set current scene to Honningbrew Meadery exterior entry.
